sentences.en: "I very much regret the injuries he sustained," he said.
sentences.cn: “我对他的受伤感到很遗憾，”他说。

sentences.en: Don’t do anything you might regret.
sentences.cn: 不要做自己会后悔的事。

sentences.en: Don't rush into marriage; you might regret it later.
sentences.cn: 不要匆匆忙忙结婚, 不然 你以后也许要后悔的.

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: From Cairo came expressions of regret at the attack.
sentences.cn: 开罗对此次攻击表示遗憾。

sentences.en: He feels deep regret about his friend's death.
sentences.cn: 他对朋友的去世深感惋惜。

sentences.en: He felt a flicker of regret.
Her lack of co-operation is nothing new, I regret to say.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我不得不说她缺少合作精神不是什么新鲜事。

sentences.en: I came to regret my unconsidered remarks.
sentences.cn: 我对我那些考虑不周的言辞开始感到后悔。

sentences.en: I don't regret stepping out of the security of marriage.
sentences.cn: 我并不后悔放弃了婚姻所带来的安全感。

sentences.en: I might well regret it later.
sentences.cn: 我很可能以后会对此后悔的。

sentences.en: If you don't do it now, you'll only regret it .
sentences.cn: 你如果现在不做，以后一定会后悔的。

sentences.en: It is with great regret that I must decline your offer.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我不得不谢绝你的好意。

sentences.en: Larry said he had no regrets about retiring.
sentences.cn: 拉里曾说他对于退休没有任何遗憾。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister expressed her regret at the failure of the talks.
sentences.cn: 首相对谈判失败表示遗憾.

sentences.en: They may be burdened by guilt and regret.
sentences.cn: 他们内心可能充满内疚和悔恨。

sentences.en: They will bitterly regret what they have done for ever more.
sentences.cn: 他们会为自己的所作所为痛悔终生。

sentences.en: We regret any inconvenience caused to our customers.
sentences.cn: 我们对于给顾客造成的不便表示歉意。

sentences.en: We regret to inform you that you are being furloughed indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 我们遗憾地通知您，您将要无限期地在家待岗。
